name: Odysseus
description:
Explore a completely procedurally generated world and see what you can find and who you can help.

CONTROLS: 

  • Menus: Arrow Keys / Enter for Keyboard or Gamepad L-Stick / Xbox A-Button
  • Movement - WASD or Gamepad L-stick
  • Interact - E or Xbox A-Button
  • Attack - Q or Xbox X-Button
  • Pause Menu - E or Xbox A-Button to bring up / Mouse or Xbox L-Stick to navigate

NOTE: This is currently a game prototype in development. Thus, there are bugs that can occur and features that will be added later. However, feedback is greatly appreciated and will be considered as development progresses.
